name: Banlist
tagline: 昵称“板栗”，EasyList China的私人订制补充规则！
body:
##Banlist

昵称“板栗”，EasyList China的私人订制补充规则！

##使用方法
#### 非常简单，你只需要依次点击下列过滤规则名称，三步即可完成订阅！
- 第一步：订阅[EasyList](https://easylist-downloads.adblockplus.org/easylist.txt)

- 第二步：订阅[EasyListChina](https://easylist-downloads.adblockplus.org/easylistchina.txt)

- 第三步：订阅[BanList](https://raw.github.com/yimike/BanList/master/BanList.txt)

- 可选：订阅[EasyPrivacy](https://easylist-downloads.adblockplus.org/easyprivacy.txt)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
